subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: With her career at a crossroads and some personal life goals — like having a family — postponed indefinitely, Vonn has charted a final competitive stage that begins when the World Cup resumes later this month.
snippet: With her career at a crossroads and some personal life goals — like having a family — postponed indefinitely, Vonn has charted a final competitive stage that begins when the World Cup resumes later this month.
